name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Senior Mobile Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance and maintainable software solutions. Expert in **ReactNative** for developing cross-platform mobile applications, ensuring adherence to **SOLID** principles and code standards to create testable and maintainable code. Proven track record in **collaboration** and **product discovery** to drive successful project outcomes. Strong background in software craftsmanship, with a commitment to building secure applications that are scalable and user-centric. Skilled in modern technologies, including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and deployment on **cloud platforms** such as **Azure** and **AWS**. Experienced in **microservices architecture**, **CI/CD automation**, and incorporating AI/ML components into software solutions, utilizing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Passionate about building systems that have a meaningful impact on users and the industries served.
